text: (THREAD) BREAKING: Biden just implicitly made the most serious allegation ever made against an American politician: that Trump-China collusion caused tens of thousands of casualties. But he's right—as a book I wrote, PROOF OF CORRUPTION, confirms. Hope you'll read on and retweet. https://t.co/19JwasK1eU
